description:
Hanabatake Yoshie is http://anidb.net/ch89068 [Yoshiko]`s mother, who is constantly worrying about her daughter, but brightens up that http://anidb.net/ch89069 [Akuru] pays attention to her and secretly hopes he and Yoshiko can marry. She hatches several schemes to have Yoshiko flirt with Akuru but they often backfire. At first she perceives http://anidb.net/ch89070 [Sayaka] to be a threat to marry Akuru but after checking her panties are that of a child, she deems her safe.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Hanabatake Yoshie
